desc:
Can we please have the Case Editor looked into, I have tried to edit the defendants detail on the below 2 matters and when clicking on save changes the defendants details disappear. This happened to both CaseID: 589601 and CaseID: 184288. I was correcting the ID numbers in both instances.

This issue occurs when amending a Defendants ID Number to blank and setting the "No ID Number" field to "True"
name: CW - GCCW085 - Case Editor issue
